</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

devotion spells; [tenets of good](/Tenets.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

You rail against the sin of sloth, turning a foe’s laziness against it. You can cast the [_litany against sloth_](/Spells.aspx?ID=396) devotion spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
